jobTitle: IT / Finance Admin Assistant - Remote | WFH
description:
Join a Leading Manufacturer and Elevate Your Career!

We're looking for an experienced IT/Finance Administrative Assistant to join our team in Los Alamitos. This is a fully remote position, but we are seeking candidates who reside within a commutable distance to the area.

About The Role

As an IT/Finance Administrative Assistant, you'll play a crucial role in ensuring smooth operations within our IT and finance departments. Your responsibilities will include:

Managing multiple email inboxes (invoicing and company-owned accounts)

Keeping track of various spreadsheets with consultant details, including purchase orders, hire and termination dates, and more

Creating and looking up purchase orders (POs)

Handling accounts payable tasks, such as creating and looking up invoices

Using SAP SuccessFactors to manage contingent workers, including adding new hires, processing terminations, and extending contracts

Managing access requests and lookups in IVANTI

Overseeing timesheets in PWA, including sending them to vendors on Tuesdays

Preparing accrual sheets for invoicing and tracking hours worked

Handling terminations in IVANTI, including managing shared folders

Organizing and managing folders on shared sites

Inputting contracts and searching for statements of work (SOWs) in CARS, as well as maintaining contact information for vendor SOWs

Assisting with SEC reporting

Position Details

Type: Full-Time, Temporary (5-month contract to cover a leave of absence)

Schedule: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM PST (40 hours per week)

Location: Remote, with a preference for candidates within a commutable distance to Los Alamitos

The final pay rate will depend on factors such as education, experience, work location, and certifications.

About You

To succeed in this role, you should have:

1-2 years of relevant administrative or project management experience

A high school diploma or GED

Strong communication skills

Proficiency in MS Excel

The ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple responsibilities simultaneously

Ready to Take the Next Step?

If you're a detail-oriented professional with a passion for supporting IT and finance operations, we encourage you to apply today!
